features.situation: to your effective HT whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

mf5KsGXg_Z51SAJPt.name: Frequency: Constantly
mf5KsGXg_Z51SAJPt.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

myAchEM2YM9xfkteo.name: Frequency: Hourly
myAchEM2YM9xfkteo.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

mlmWpZ4mwq8Y5cMod.name: Frequency: Daily
mlmWpZ4mwq8Y5cMod.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

mXiKtN_v1PNpAPxgg.name: Frequency: Weekly
mXiKtN_v1PNpAPxgg.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

m63BIa70luoTqFFTt.name: Frequency: Monthly
m63BIa70luoTqFFTt.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

mO84WpFaEhGFsMZnE.name: Frequency: Seasonally
mO84WpFaEhGFsMZnE.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

mUYHFvxJX4MESR-AK.name: Frequency: Yearly
mUYHFvxJX4MESR-AK.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

mBomxyzRrIWWMsU0L.name: Aging
mBomxyzRrIWWMsU0L.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

tGOQHgTE_5p3c6C0g.name: Loner
tGOQHgTE_5p3c6C0g.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

tOqp-Pyl4vD8zQauI.name: Selfish
tOqp-Pyl4vD8zQauI.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

tzZQVfJSA2ztJXJwo.name: Social Stigma (Second-Class Citizen)
tzZQVfJSA2ztJXJwo.notes: You belong to a group that receives fewer rights and privileges than “full citizens.”
